thread.title: Save Big On Group Travel At Marriott Memphis East

author: cbs8
title: Save Big On Group Travel At Marriott Memphis East
text:
Marriott Memphis East
Hotel in Memphis, TN offers special deal for group bookings on select dates, now through the end of 2015
MEMPHIS, Tenn. , Aug. 18, Now is the perfect time to take advantage of a special group booking deal at Marriott Memphis East , offered on select dates through the end of the year.
Meeting and event planners trusted with the responsibility of booking travel to Memphis for their colleagues will find sweet relief at the chance to save up to $3,000 when making a $5,000 minimum booking. This special also includes the perks of earning double Marriott Rewards points and receiving a complimentary two-hour welcome reception for up to 40 people.
One of many deals offered at the Memphis hotel, the group special is available for the following dates in 2015:
Aug. 23-25 , 28-30 Sept. 2-3 , 6-8, 11-12, 17-20 Oct. 16-17 , 22-24, 29-31 Nov. 12-15 Dec. 11-13 , 25-28 With six elegant ballrooms and boardrooms , featuring 7,807 total square feet of event space, Marriott Memphis East is ideal for hosting conferences, meetings and social events for up to 400 guests. From high-speed Internet access, both wired and wireless, to customized catering menus, event groups will find everything they need for a successful gathering in Memphis . Equipped with modern technologies, meeting rooms also include LCD panels and projectors, microphones, optional stages and televisions. An on-site business center is also available and offers convenient copy, fax and delivery services to help create a seamless event.
Between meetings or before heading out to explore the town, visitors are invited to relax with colleagues or friends in the Great Room's lobby bar, complete with complimentary wireless Internet access, or indulge at Table â€“ A Delta Grille, the hotel's restaurant . For a delightful dining experience in Memphis , often called the Barbecued Pork Capital of the World, guests can choose from a wide selection of classic Southern dishes with a contemporary flair.
After a productive day of meetings or events, group travelers will appreciate their spacious accommodations with luxurious bedding featuring pillow-top mattresses and plush duvets. Rooms feature large work desks to keep corporate travelers productive in privacy, as well as mini refrigerators, flat-panel TVs with premium cable and movie channels and chic furniture for lounging in style.
About Marriott Memphis East
Marriott Memphis East at 5795 Poplar Ave. in Memphis, TN is just minutes from Graceland, Beale Street , Memphis Zoo and FedEx Forum, home of the Memphis Grizzlies. The hotel features 10 floors, 229 guest rooms, 3 suites, 6 event spaces with 7,807 square feet of total space, a full-service restaurant, indoor swimming pool and 24-hour exercise room. A complimentary airport shuttle service to and from Memphis International Airport (MEM) is available upon request. For information, visit www.marriott.com/MEMMM or call 1-901-682-0080.
Join Marriott Rewards now and earn points that can be redeemed for free hotel stays and room upgrades at 3,800 hotels in over 70 countries.
